description: Ministry of Labour and Trade Union Relations - Rejection of the Awards made the Industrial Disputes between Mr. R. D. Dhanapala and Lanka Electricity Board; between Control Room Operators' Union of Grid Sub-Station (for Mr. P. Geethsiri Perera) and Lanka Electricity Board and between Mr. N. R. B. Samaranayake and Lanka Electricity Board - Award made to the Industrial Dispute between Mr. S. Dayananda and Colombo Commercial Company (Engineers) Limited
